## TIL20220816 

### 반복적용 purr - map()

source - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zqL_lBQjFUE   

```{r}
if(!require(purrr)) { install.packages("purrr"); library(purrr); }
```

```{r}
exams <- list(s1 = c(78, 89, 91, 85, 95, 98),
              s2 = c(85, 86, 97, 99, 90),
              s3 = c(98, 96, 89, 90, 93, 85, 92),
              s4 = c(98, 96, 91, 88, 93, 99))
exams
```

```{r}
map(.x = exams, .f=mean)
```

```{r}
lapply(exams, mean)
```

```{r}
map_df(exams, mean)
```

```{r}
map_dbl(exams, mean)
```

```{r}
map_dbl(exams, mean, trim = 0.3)
```

```{r}
exams %>% 
  map_dbl(mean)
```

```{r}
exams %>% 
  map(range) 
```

```{r}
exams %>% 
  map(range) %>% 
  map_dbl(diff)
```

```{r}
exams %>% 
  map(function(x) x * 1.1)
```

```{r}
exams %>% 
  map(~.x*1.1)
```

```{r}
exams %>% 
  map(~.*1.1)
```

```{r}
fruits <- c("Apple", "Banana", "Strawberry")
fruits %>% 
  map_chr(paste, "Juice", sep="-")
```

```{r}
fruits %>% 
  map_chr(~paste(.x, "Juice", sep="-"))
```

```{r}
lst <- list(list(num=1:3, letters[1:3]),
            list(num=101:103, chr = letters[4:6]),
            list(),
            list(num=c(9,99), chr = letters[7:9]))
lst
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map("num")
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map("num", .default = "???")
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map("chr", .default = NA)
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map(2, .default = NA)
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map(c(2,2))
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map_chr(c(2,2), .default = NA)
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map(list("num", 3))
```

```{r}
lst %>% 
  map_int(list("num", 3), .default = NA)

```

```{r}
str(mtcars)
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  split(.$am)
```

```{r}
models <- mtcars %>% 
  split(.$am) %>% 
  map(~lm(mpg ~ wt, data = .))
models
```

```{r}
model0 <- summary(models$`0`)
str(model0)
```

```{r}
names(model0)
```

```{r}
model0$r.squared
```

```{r}
models %>% 
  map(summary) %>% 
  map_dbl(function(x) x$r.squared)
```

```{r}
models %>% 
  map(summary) %>% 
  map_dbl(~.x$r.squared) # map_dbl(~.$r.squared)
```

```{r}
models %>% 
  map(summary) %>% 
  map_dbl("r.squared")
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  split(.$am) %>% 
  map(~lm(mpg ~ wt, data = .)) %>% 
  map(summary) %>% 
  map_dbl("r.squared")
```
